snippet: The Chefs Collaborative, a network of advocates for sustainable food, have begun a national campaign to encourage chefs to feature the fish to demonstrate its commercial value.
abstract: Chefs Collaborative, a network of advocates for sustainable food, have begun a national campaign to encourage chefs to feature salmon from Bristol Bay, Alaska, to demonstrate its commercial value.
lead_paragraph: The Chefs Collaborative, a network of advocates for sustainable food, have begun a national campaign to encourage chefs to feature the fish to demonstrate its commercial value.
